title: COMPANY detail page Â» IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see a gallery of IMAGES that illustrate each COMPANY\
So I can get an impression about the founders, their factories or the location
description:
* The COMPANY detail page contains a section with a list of all connected IMAGES.
* Each IMAGE in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each IMAGE in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each IMAGE in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no IMAGE connected to the COMPANY then the section is not displayed at all.
